rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Utilize her office hours. She's good at figuring out where the concepts aren't connecting for you.
She was an okay professor.  Not really the clearest lecturer.  I didn't feel very prepared for the tests.  Basically, she wasn't horrible, but physics could have been better.

The lecture is just to work out example problems, you do clicker question in class and discuss the answer with neighbors...  The quizzes are really terrible, 5question each maybe usually multiple choice, but not very good questions... easier if u read the chapter b4 each class period like you're supposed to...

After a terrible professor for 104, I thought I was doomed to hate Physics. But Churukian made it interesting. She was an extremely nice and helpful professor and was always prepared to answer or get back to me on my strange questions. Highly recommended.
